thread.title: DHS Still Needs To Enhance Efforts To Address Port Cybersecurity Gaps, GAO Says
thread.title_full: DHS Still Needs To Enhance Efforts To Address Port Cybersecurity Gaps, GAO Says

title: DHS Still Needs To Enhance Efforts To Address Port Cybersecurity Gaps, GAO Says
text:
12 DHS Still Needs To Enhance Efforts To Address Port Cybersecurity Gaps, GAO Says 
Homeland Security Today: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) has “partially addressed two” port cybersecurity-related recommendations made in a Government Accountability Office (GAO) audit report in June 2014, Gregory C. Wilshusen, director of GAO Information Security Issues, told the House Committee on Homeland Security Subcommittee on Border and Maritime Security at a recent hearing.
